name: Pawsh Inc.
description: Developer of a pet grooming application designed to make the pet care delivery system transparent and friendly. The company's application connects users with top-rated and vetted pet grooming experts who come directly to their homes for a delightful grooming session, enabling pet owners to groom their pets easily and witness the grooming process from start to finish, and be satisfied with the way grooming services are performed.
one_liner: Developer of a pet grooming application designed to make the pet care delivery system transparent and friendly. The company's application connects users with top-rated and vetted pet grooming experts who come directly to their homes for a delightful grooming session, enabling pet owners to groom their pets easily and witness the grooming process from start to finish, and be satisfied with the way grooming services are performed.
